about_the_game:
Nuke Them All- Prologue - Doomsday clock 5 minutes before the midnight


Doomsday clock ticks 5 minutes to midnight, unraveling the tale of a nuclear disaster's genesis. Dive into chaos blending humor and horror, setting the stage for strategic battles.

Chaos rules everything!

Experience the blend of laughs and chills as the prologue introduces a world teetering on the brink. Aliens, zombies, and the impending midnight nuke add twists to capture flags, conquer territories, and eliminate the enemy fort. Dive into a fast-paced, action-packed, old-school RTS inspired by '90s classics such as Z, KKND, Command & Conquer: Red Alert, as well as modern classics like C&C Generals, Company of Heroes, and They Are Billions..

Flags mean victory!

Time becomes your crucial resource. Capture flags, reduce production time, and unlock secret weapons and hidden technologies. The more flags you secure, the faster your robots and tanks are produced.

Defend your fort at all costs!

Strategically defend against impending doom. Drag and drop fortified artillery positions, protect remote territories with expandable mobile artillery, tactical miners, and Sentinel APCs.

Upgrade your factories

Level up your tech to access advanced units like Laser bots, Rocket bots, Fire bots, Electrobots, and advanced tanks. Crush your enemies strategically amidst the chaos.

Pizza over mission, sir!

Humor-packed voiceovers, puns, dad jokes, and movie references accompany your journey. AI voice tips provide real-time situation overviews, complemented by award-winning '90s nostalgia soundtracks.

Clean, eye-catching 2D graphics

Bid farewell to cluttered GUI menus. Immerse yourself in intense battles with seamless navigation, incredible particle effects, explosions, a new physics engine, and entertaining ragdoll animations.

DIFFICULT? Check.

Engage in massive battles across varied maps. Don't be fooled by casual graphics; the fast-paced, challenging AI will keep your heart pumping.

Day and night change and weather effects!

Zombies lurk at night, threatening unprotected territories. Destroy graveyards to stop the menace. Witness day-night changes and various weather effects, adding unpredictability to your battles.

And finally, the cherry on the cake - the Nuke ☢️

Take control of the nuclear silo, unleashing the ultimate weapon. But beware, it's a high-risk, high-reward gameplay element. Enemies can shoot down the unexploded bomb, so plan your attack carefully.

Alien Allies Joining Forces!

Introducing a new faction: Alien Allies. Capture the secret Alien Beacon to call for their help and witness the magic unfold.

A huge variety of epic worlds, maps, and missions

Explore strategic maps in RTS and tower defense styles. Encounter desert worlds, post-apocalyptic scenarios, zombie apocalypses, and more.

Collect Crystals & Minerals 💎

Discover precious mineral crystals in secret locations. Use the Hedgehog vehicle to collect resources and summon formidable interplanetary reinforcements.

Base building? Why not! ⚒

Deploy and build your own factories using portable mobile factory vehicles on certain maps.

Advanced Tactics and Enemy AI

Master advanced tactics, choose tactical vehicles wisely, and outsmart the relentless AI launching attacks from all directions.

Chaos Unleashed!

Experience catastrophic elements like tornadoes, volcanoes, dune worms, earthquakes, and more, adding an extra layer of chaos to your battles.

Unleash Your Strategy: Create and Conquer!

Dive into the SANDBOX Map Editor, test different unit interactions, and unleash your creativity.

Offense vs. Defense?

Craft your strategic mission plan by fortifying positions or taking an offensive approach. Intuitive controls give you the power to shape the battlefield.

Challenge yourself with thrilling Zombie Survival, Aliens, and Nuke Football missions, plus diverse game modes like Tower Defense and Clash Royale style battles.



Crafted by die-hard RTS fans, this new RTS will fill you with nostalgia for the good old times. If you're a new generation player, it will inspire you to revisit and rediscover the RTS genre all over again!



#LetsBringRTSBack! Don't wait - Wishlist now!
